name: HP Inc.
summary: HP Inc. is a leading American multinational information technology company headquartered in Palo Alto, California. It develops and sells personal computers, printers, and related supplies, and is recognized as one of the worldâ€™s largest PC vendors. HP Inc. was formed in 2015 as a spin-off from the original Hewlett-Packard and is publicly traded on the NYSE under the ticker HPQ.
